page.title: 09Housing
page.content:
Housing
Like nearly everyone in my school I live in a terraced house. I've got my own bedroom and my own television. In our road there are lots of nice houses but is is a very busy road. Our garden has flowers and a swing and a climbing frame and it joins onto the park. At the other end of the road is a field. Our milkman comes round every day. I live in a flat. It is the middle of three storeys. Nearby is a much taller building with seven floors. I live in a council house and I share my room with my sister. Our garden is very neat, we have flowers growing. My mum works in an old peoples home and we live in the big house next to the office.
